\nThis scroll allows one to transfer a pet's ability points (level + closeness) to any other pet.

Gwin's Diary
#L1##bThe first page of the diary...#k#l
#L3##bskip...#k#l
#L7##bTo the last page of the diary#k#l
April 29th, 2006.\nWeather : Pretty much sunny

I have finally arrived the world of MapleStory. Through meeting new people, which included chatting and even receiving some help from them, I was able to reach a town called Amherst.\r\nJudging by the weak monsters showing up outside town, it doesn't seem like it's as dangerous as the place was made out to be...
May 2nd, 2006.\nWeather : Pretty much Sunny
The great weather seemed to be the norm here these days. \n\nI went around town for the past few days and this place is very peaceful.
(skip)
June 2nd, 2006.\nWeather : Partly Cloudy

I ran into Manji, and I was immediately taken aback by his cocky attitude, as if I shouldn't even be talking to him. Did a famous warrior get hit or something, just like John said? Anyway, I decided to roam around Perion.\nI met Ayan, a little girl. She's pale white, and yet she's dressed up as a native Indian, as if she's the chief's daughter. She may grow up to be quite a hottie...haha.
(skip)
August 2nd, 2006.\nWeather : Snowing in El Nath, even in the summer!
I'm still not used to this. Everytime I feel warm and fuzzy in Orbis with a warm breeze hitting me, I'll feel the icy coldness that penetrates my body once I get to El Nath.

A very disdainful old lady tried to see my horoscope by grabbing my hand and dragging me to her house, that I ran away to El Nath, eventhough I was ill-prepared for the coldness that surely greeted us. Thanks to that escape, I caught a very nasty fever, and I am currently recuperating at Jade's house.
August 10th, 2006.\nWeather : Sunny

I finally heard about a monster named Balrog. It looks like my first order of business is to kill it. 1. What's a Beginner?

A beginner may not strike fear into anyone, but the potential is limitless. The abilities may not be there just yet, so the beginners spend the majority of the time at Maple Island training for the big time.
Once the training in Maple Island is complete, move to Victoria Island for a whole new set of competition, bigger world to play around with and job advancement.
Even the very best at one went through growing pains of being a beginner. Please train diligently to become a significant player yourself!
#L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l
2-1. Basic Controls : Control

#eLeft, Right Arrow#n : Move left and right
#eUp, Down Arrow#n : Use rope or ladder to climb up and down, use portal
#eAlt #n: Jump
#eCtrl#n: Attack
#eZ or 0 in NumPad #n: Pick up items
#eE#n:  Opening equipment window
#eI#n: Opening item window
#eS#n: Opening ability window
#eK#n: Opening skill window
#bTip.#k At the bottom right corner of the screen, allot one of the HotKey's with a 'use' item or a skill to have easy access to the item or the skill.
2-2. Basic Controls : Command
Enter these commands in the chat window to use these functions
(1) #eChat#n\n

#e/all#n : Chat in regular method.
#e/buddy#n : Talk in buddy chat mode.
#e/party#n : Talk to your party members.
#e/guild#n : Talk to your guild members.
#e/whisper [character name]#n : whisper to a particular user.
(2) #eAction#n\n
#e/find [character name]#n : Checks the availability of the character / notifies the current place the character is in.\n#e/trade [character name]#n : Request for a trade.
(3) #eParty#n\n

#e/partyinfo#n : Check out the information on the party members currently signed up in the party.
#e/makeparty#n : Create a new party.
#e/leaveparty#n : Leave the current party.
#e/partyexpell#n : Forcefully expells a party member.#b(Party Leader)#k
#L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l
3. What are Items?
(1) #eEquipment Item#n\n  An item that can be equipped. Consists of a regular equipment item, which boosts the character's abillities, and cash item, which is geared more towards the appearance.
To equp an equipment item, open the equipment window and drag the item to the slot, or double-click on the item

(2) #eUse Item#n\n  These items consist of potions that help recover HP and/or MP, scrolls that upgrade the equipment items, and other 1-time items. Double-click on the item to use it, and the item will disappear following its use.
(3)#e Etc. Item#n\n  These items consist of monster leftovers, quest items, ores, jewels, and other items. Etc. items cannot be used by itself,
but they are pivotal in completing quests and other missions in the game.
(4)#e Cash Item#n\n  Items that can be purchased in Cash Shop. Primarily for appearance, as well as some visual effects.#rCash Items cost money, and Cash can be charged to purchase these items.#k
4. AP and SP
(1) #eAP(Ability Point)#n\nPoints that can be allocated to one of these categories: Strength(STR), Dexterity(DEX), Intelligence(INT), Luck(LUK), MaxHP, MaxMP. Earns 5 points for every level up.
#bStrength(STR)#k - Essential to carry around heavy armors and weapons. Most important to the warriors, for it directly determines the level of attack the warrior performs.
#bDexterity(DEX)#k - The higher this stat, the higher the accuracy and avoidability. The number one factor in determining the level of attack for bowmen.
#bIntelligence(INT)#k - The higher this stat, the better magic attacks get, as well as affecting the Max MP if AP is used in this stat. The number one factor in determining the mage's Magic Attack.
#L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l

#bLuck(LUK)#k - The higher this stat is, the higher the avoidability, as well as a decrease in the EXP suffered from dying during the game. The number one factor in determining the level of attack for thieves.

(2) #eSP(Skill Point)#n\nThese points are earned after the 1st job advancement, and the points can be allocated towards skills available for the job. Each subsequent level-up will give 3 skill points.
5. What's a Job Advancement?
All characters may make the job advancement after reaching a certin level. #r1st job advancement occurs at Level 8~10, 2nd at Level 30, and 3rd at Level 70#k
Once the job advancement takes place,  new skills can be mastered,  occupational weapons will be available, HP and MP will increase, and attack + defense will improve.
6. 1st Job Advancement : How?
To make the 1st job advancement, first leave Maple Island and head over to Victoria Island.
To reach the Victoria Island, pay 150 mesos at Southperry and get on board the ship that heads to Lith Harbor.
Once at Lith Harbor, either take a cab or walk to each of these towns for the job advancement.
(1)#e Warrior#n\n#rLevel 10 and over, STR over 35#k. Once the criteria is met, meet #bDances with Balrog#k at Perion to learn a thing or two about becoming a true warrior.
(2) #eBowman#n\n#rLevel 10 and over, DEX over 25#k. Once the criteria is met, meet #bAthena Pierce#k at Henesys and learn what it's like to be the true bowman.

(3) #eThief#n\n#rLevel 10 and over, DEX over 25#k. Once the criteria is met, meet #bDark Lord#k of Kerning City and pick up aspects of what it's like to live in the dark, becoming a true thief in the process.
(4)#e Magician#n\n#rLevel 8 and over, INT over 20#k. Once the criteria is met, meet #bGrendel the Really Old#k of Ellinia and learn the ins and outs of becoming a true magician.
(5)#ePirate#n\n#rLevel 10 and over.#k Once he criteria is met, meet #bKyrin# at Nautilus and learn what it's like to be a true pirate.
#bTip.#k It is strongly recommended that the job advancement takes place as soon as your character is at an eligible level.

#e#bWhat's Leafre?#k#n
\nLocation : West Ossyria
Population : Hafring
\nLeafre is a town located right at the center of Minar Forest, the oldest forest in Ossyria.
#bHow to get to Leafre 1 #k
\n1. At Ellinia Station, get on board the ride to Orbis
2. Get off at Orbis Station
3. At Orbis Station, get on board the ride to Leafre
4. Get off at Leafre
#bHow to Get to Leafre 2 #k
\n1.At  Ludibrium Station, get on board the ride to Orbis
2. Get off at Orbis Station
3. At Orbis Station, get on board the ride to Leafre
4. Get off at Leafre
April 16th
#eTitle : I have finally started writing a diary.

The Owl of Minerva brought me some news. Apparently, there's a major movement amongst the humans in regards to writing a diary everyday.  As a goddess who needs to set a positive example to the humans, I have decided to follow suit. Truth be told, I'm already worried about writing an entry everyday.
I have decided to keep a journal but writing a journal entry everyday is not as easy as I thought it would be.
April 19th
#eTitle : My Statue
The humans elected a huget tower as well as build a statue of my likeness.

For them to make a beautiful statue out of these rocks made me realize how brilliant the humans are with their ability to create something. I was so impressed by the statue that I have decided to keep it inside my tower.
April 23rd
#eTitle : Lazy Afternoon...
\nIt's been a habit of mine lately to start each morning by staring at my statue while drinking tea. The more I look at it, the more I like how the statue resembles me a lot.
For humans to create a statue of my likeness with rocks... it still blows my mind.
April 24th
#eTitle : Unwelcome Guest
\nToday, Papa Pixie came by for a visit wearing this round, weird-looking hat. He came wanting to buy some Water of Life so he can raise more Pixies.
I had to sternly tell him that the Water of Life is not for sale, much to his chagrin.
April 27th
#eTitle : Busted Statue of Goddess
\n Today was a really rough day.
I heard a crack in the middle of the night, so I woke up only to find out my statue has been busted. Next to the crumbled statue was a footprint.
How dare that person to walk into my tower and have the audacity to break my statue!!
April 28th
#eTitle : Papa Pixie's 2nd Visit
\nPapa Pixie, who came by a couple of days ago wanting the Water of Life, came back again, asking if I was interested in selling that water.
Amazingly, Papa Pixie offered to help fix the statue, which I was glad to hear. But then again, how did he know that the statue was busted in the first place?
April 30th
#eTitle : A Visit by Human
\nToday, the humans paid a visit to the tower. I didn't want them to see the busted statue, so I had to hurriedly cover it up with some cloth.
Humans seemed to wonder why I put a cloth over the statue. I better get this fixed before they find out.
May 3rd
#eTitle : Lazy Papa Pixie
\nToday I felt like watering the garden, so I headed there, only to see Papa Pixie just sizing up the garden instead of working on the statue.
He didn't even finish fixing it, and for him to slack off like this? I was so mad I chased him out of the garden. Once the statue is taken care of, I will no doubt kick him out of the tower!
May 5th
#eTitle : Eak's Lecture

\nEak was following me around all day, telling me that Star Pixie is indeed acting suspicious and that I should kick him out of the tower immediately. Apparently, he kept on bringing unknown and unwanted pixies into the premise.
I am not a big fan of Papa Pixie, either, but I was so annoyed by Eak's constant yapper that I decided to ruin his cloud pieces. Hopefully that'll put an end to all that bla bla bla.
May 7th
#eTitle : Restoring the Statue
Looking at the busted statue of goddess, Papa Pixie said in order to make a new one, he'll need a new model and asked me for help.

Apparently, all I need to do is walk into the statue for a second, and he'll use his magic power to sketch it up and make a new one. It doesn't seem like a hard thing to do, so I agreed to do it. Finally!! The statue will be back up by tomorrow!
...(Prologue)...

#eIntroduction#

Great Warrior Sayram is the most outstanding swordsman in the history of MapleStory. He had mastered all the warrior classes including Hero, Paladin and Dark Knight, which no others have done before. \nBut his popularity and admiration from the people came not because of this. It is for Sayram's heroic and risky stories which allow the travelers in MapleStory to believe in the true meaning of courage and bravery.

And because of this, Sayram's stories were loved and passed on by many. 
Borned in a village among the deep forests in Victoria Island, he had went through countless tough ordeals to become a true hero... Hopefully, Maple travellers will be touched by Sayram's story to self-explore and make great achievements.

#eSky of Griffrey#n

One day, Sayram arrived in the city of Orbis. In the Garden of Darkness, he saw an animal that he had never seen before! That animal had a long white horn on it's head like an eagle, 4 limbs of a horse, a lion's tail and a pair of large wings on its body. \nDeeply attracted by this animal, Sayram started to approach it slowly. But when the animal saw Sayram, it made a strange scream and starts to attack Sayram to protect itself.
\n\nThis animal possesses lightning speed, and wields a pair of giant wings that sent out strong gale of wind.

It was rumored that he first got to know about magic through a travelling magician. Having to arrive at the remotely small village, the magician doesn't seems to be that great afterall, and the magic he saw could be of a basic magic trick!  But somehow, it still touches him to see a magical ray created out of nowhere, and through this, he firmly set a target to possess this mysterious strength.

In order to study magic, he arrived at Ellinia, but there are no magicians willing to take him in. Although the present Ellinia forest should be consider as opened, compared to its past when the Ellinia forest is a more secluded environment. To everyone, he was just a naive countryside kid who knows nothing about magic.

But he has never given up. The passion for learning magic has made him work even harder. So, he settled down in Ellinia and goes around researching on his magical studies. The people teased his eagerness. But not long after, the people around could not help but to agree with him, because... by the time he completed his first round of research, people became more aware of his talent!

During that time, Grendel the Really Old who is the elder of Ellinia, believed that he can attain and become an outstanding magician, and also entrust him with many matters. He loves to research on magic that can revive the forest, and also provides lots of help to the magical forest. Besides Ellinia, the magical forest, in order to create forest in other region, he start to research on related issues.

To have flowers to blooming in a deserted area... should be a difficult matter! In order to obtain more magical knowledge, he started researching on ancient magic, working hard to understand the books of magic research, and also obtained suitable result. During that time... he was named the Genius of Ellinia.

The Genius of Ellinia Forest! With the ability of his talent, he completed his second, third and fourth advancement within a short time period. Nobody is able to beat his time record. Yet, he shows no arrogance, and continue to research on more advanced magic. He... has always hungered for higher levels of magic...

However... could this never-satisfying of hunger for magic... caused an adverse effect? In order to obtain more powers, he gets contact with the forbidden ancient book! For other people, even they could obtain that ancient book, they will not be able to understand the content. But... because of what of a talent he is, he was able to self-learnt the ancient magic... After obtaining the power... he did not know realised the actual fact that it is a Dark Force...

The force of the black magic starts to control him slowly, gradually causing his personality to change. He used to be a cheerful and bright guy, deeply concentrating in his research, but he gradually changes into an extremely moody guy. People thought that his changed of personality was a result of over-tiredness, and never start to think strangely...

In the end... the black magic had fully controlled him, and he now could not use the original magic he has. But he couldn't reverse back the time, he could only immerse deeply into the practice of black magic, and now... he had made a grave mistake which cannot be reversed.
He had spent a part of his life creating new magic skills... Isn't he aware that the force he had created could harm the world? In the end... he suffered for his own fate!

For him, who has lost his human appearance, he decided to seek the punishments from the elders. Gritto proposed of destroying him, but Grendel the Really Old could not bear to do it to his beloved disciple. Hence, it was decided to seal all his magic skills and he will be watched by the Elders. As a talented magician, his future has definitely gone to a waste.
In the end... I am unable to write down the name of this rare talented magician in the historical record book...This is deeply regretted...

X/X/XX \nLately, I've had recurring thoughts...was it a mistake to fall deeply in love with a Fairy?  I confess that I did not count on suddenly being so aware of my lifespan in comparison to that of an immortal. It's funny that I worry already about what would most likely happen in 40-50 years, but... I am afraid of one day leaving Phyllia for good.  Such a painful goodbye...perhaps there is a way to avert it...

X/X/XX \nPhyllia is pregnant! I am filled with joy and curiosity to see how he or she will look. Phyllia mentioned how rare it is to have a baby between a Fairy and a human being, and she feels that it's a blessing from the Goddess, but... why can't I shake off this uneasy feeling? Since the baby is half Fairy, the baby should live a long time...but just thinking about leaving Phyllia and my child by themselves makes me queasy.

X/X/XX \nI began new research on extending one's lifespan. Some magicians were able to succeed in doing so, but...no known alchemists so far that have succeeded in this. (Alcaster did, but he's a magician as well...) Unlike magic, alchemy is a field where one needs to pay a price in order to achieve the desired result.  I'll just have to put my faith in the power of Alcadno.

X/X/XX \nI didn't even know where to start in terms of prolonging one's life, so I decided on a multiple experiment approach. Medicine and potions will be a good start, and I began working with Russellon.  However, I have met another fellow, with a variety of bright ideas. Maybe it's because he's a wandering alchemist who travels the world, but his opinions and views are radical.  Change the human body into a machine?

X/X/XX \nThe research is not going as well as I hoped. Failure seems to lurk around every bend, no matter the road. Changing the human body into a machine works in theory, but not in reality thus far. Any living organism converted into a machine simply ceases to be human. There's no point in prolonging my life through this procedure. What good would I be as a mindless husk?  I would never be able to hear my lover laugh again, or cry...what will I do?
...This is driving me crazy. I don't see this experiment working out. Phyllia's stomach is getting bigger and bigger by day. I am getting nervous. Too nervous. This is driving me insane.

X/X/XX \nMy precious child opened her eyes for the first time today. With her blonde hair and milky white skin...she looks exactly like Phyllia, ever with her tiny wings. She is the most beautiful thing I have ever seen.  We decided to name her Keeny. Phyllia is quite fond of the name...says its "fitting for a fairy". I must find a way to prolong my life, so I might see my child grow.  But how?  I will need a breakthrough soon...

Even with all that... if the experiment worked out... if it worked out... then...

X/X/XX \nLately, I've had recurring thoughts...was it a mistake to fall deeply in love with a Fairy?  I confess that I did not count on suddenly being so aware of my lifespan in comparison to that of an immortal. It's funny that I worry already about what would most likely happen in 40-50 years, but... I am afraid of one day leaving Phyllia for good.  Such a painful goodbye...perhaps there is a way to avert it...

X/X/XX \nPhyllia is pregnant! I am filled with joy and curiosity to see how he or she will look. Phyllia mentioned how rare it is to have a baby between a Fairy and a human being, and she feels that it's a blessing from the Goddess, but... why can't I shake off this uneasy feeling? Since the baby is half Fairy, the baby should live a long time...but just thinking about leaving Phyllia and my child by themselves makes me queasy.

X/X/XX \nI began new research on extending one's lifespan. Some magicians were able to succeed in doing so, but...no known alchemists so far that have succeeded in this. (Alcaster did, but he's a magician as well...) Unlike magic, alchemy is a field where one needs to pay a price in order to achieve the desired result.  I'll just have to put my faith in the power of Alcadno.

X/X/XX \nI didn't even know where to start in terms of prolonging one's life, so I decided on a multiple experiment approach. Medicine and potions will be a good start, and I began working with Russellon.  However, I have met another fellow, with a variety of bright ideas. Maybe it's because he's a wandering alchemist who travels the world, but his opinions and views are radical.  Change the human body into a machine?

X/X/XX \n...The research is not going as well as I hoped. Whatever experiment I conduct, I keep failing in the end. I thought it'd be possible to change the human body into a machine, but... it works in theory, for sure. The problem is, the experiments never end up like my theory. Any living organism that has been converted into a machine loses its identity, and ceases to move around. If that's the case, there's no point of obtaining a long lifespan through this procedure. I am looking for a way for me to see Phyllia's face, hear Phyllia's voice, and engage her in meaningful conversations for a long, long time... is that possible?
...This is driving me crazy. I don't see this experiment working out. Phyllia's stomach is getting bigger and bigger by day. I am getting nervous. Too nervous. This is driving me insane.

X/X/XX \nMy precious child opened her eyes for the first time today. With her blonde hair and milky white skin...she looks exactly like Phyllia, ever with her tiny wings. She is the most beautiful thing I have ever seen.  We decided to name her Keeny. Phyllia is quite fond of the name...says its "fitting for a fairy". I must find a way to prolong my life, so I might see my child grow.  But how?  I will need a breakthrough soon...

X/X/XX \nWhile passing through the lab in the basement, I found a strange, ancient passage that I didn't notice before. It looked like a passage that was used a long time ago... It appears to link the two societies, as wel as lead further underground.  Never knew there was a place like this in Magatia. It seems shrouded in secrecy, and thus, such a secret bears further investigation.

X/X/XX \nI decided to explore the previously unknown, seemingly endless, underground passage. After descending for what seemed like an eternity, I encountered a mysterious cave... It looked like someone conducted an experiment there. I didn't know a place like this existed underneath Magatia. After cleaning up the hopelessly messy cave, I realized there was a wealth of old data lying around here.  What secrets are hidden among these pages?

X/X/XX \n...I found out an amazing, no, terrifying truth. The lab I walked into through the underground passage was the lab where the Black Magician concocted his findings. I can't believe it. The lab of that evil human being actually still exists...? Then I came back to my senses, and realized that the Black Magician, who put a terror into everyone's lives for hundreds of years in Ossyria, may know a thing or two about extending the lifespan.
...I have started to really delve into the research data the Black Magician came up with... I knew deep in my heart that I shouldn't do this, but... as long as I can extend my lifespan...

X/X/XX \n...The records that the Black Magician left behind... they seem eerily similar, eventhough he came up with these hundreds of years ago. Why is that? It's convenient in that it's easy to duplicate... but... something inside me feels not right about this.

X/X/XX \nThe alchemy of Magatia, and that of the Black Magician.  The more I uncover, the more the link appears to be irrefutable.  Hopefully I am wrong, I do not wish our alchemy to be in any way shape or form related to that evil being.  I am even more disturbed about this hidden disciple, who wished to combine this terrible magic with advanced technology. He vanished just as suddenly as he appeared...but where could he have gone?

My fears are now confirmed. Not only is the alchemy of Magatia based upon the Black Magician, the very foundations of this land are steeped in his power.  For a deserted, dry land like this with no oasis to have a town like this... has to be because of the Black Magician. That evil Black Magician...for his work to be the genesis of what we all do these days...is that really the inconvenient truth about Magatia?

What would happen if the world found out that I had been using the studies of Black Magician to extend my lifespan? A tempting thought I must admit, though it would earn me scorn from everyone in this land. The alchemists of Alcadno, Zenumist, the head of the Alcadno Society, even Russellon...even the wandering alchemist would no longer respect me. Even with all that...if the experiment worked out...

Legend of the Snail

Unbeknownst to many Maple World travelers is a peculiar creature. When I was young, I came across one of these. It was a snail but much larger and older...It has been said that it has the longest life span amongst all Maple World snails.

Since I was young, I was always drawn to the snails. This one time when I was observing the little creature at a close distance, I noticed something. The snail was leaving a trail of snail shells of which some were green, blue, and red. But there was this one shell that stood out amongst the rest.

That shell had an array of rainbow colors. Its colors are so captivating that you know it's very valuable at first glance. Its value is cannot be compared with any treasure or jewel. I took that snail shell and guarded it with my life.
When I used the shell... I was able to achieve anything I wished to. The rainbow snail shell made all my hopes and desires come true! The thing I wished for was...!

#eA Guide to Using the Maker Skill#n

-Written by -
Vaughn Lee, Stan & Louie
#e1. What is the Maker Skill?#n
It's a skill that allows you to create an item through the fundamentals of alchemy. All you need are materials and a small fee, and you're set.
#e2. How to make the Monster Crystal#n

(1) Select [Monster Crystal]-[Monster Crystal] in the Maker Skill window.\n(2) Go to your Inventory and move the 100+ items that you've won by fighting level 31+ monsters to the Maker Skill window. \n(3) Click on the 'Make' button and you will have a Monster Crystal.
#bTip.#k Remember, there is, in fact, a chance that you may end up making a higher-leveled Monster Crystal!\n#bTip.#k Also, note that not all quest items or items dropped by monsters can be used.
#e3. How to Make Equipment Items#n

(1) Go to the Maker Skill window and click on the type and name of equipment item you would like to make for yourself. \n(2) Select all the materials you will need to make the equipment item. Check each material. If you are missing some of the required materials, you will find that the icon for that material is in gray. \n (3) Click on the 'Make' button and your equipment item should be ready to go!
#bTip.#k By registering an accelerator or an upgraded gem, you can make yourself a higher quality item with better options.
#e4. How to Make Upgraded Gems#n

(1) Go to the Maker Skill window and click on the type and name of the upgraded gem you would like to make for yourself.\n  (2) Check to see if you have all the required materials for making the gem. If you are missing some of the required materials, you will find that the icon for that material is in gray. \n  (3) Click on the 'Make' button and your upgraded gem should be ready to go!

#bTip.#k Note that there is always the chance that you may end up making yourself an intermediate grade or high grade gem!\n#bTip.#k If you collect at least 10 upgraded gems for yourself, you'll be able to refine them and turn them into an even higher grade gem.
#e5. How to Disassemble Equipment Items#n

(1) Go to the Maker Skill window and click on the [Disassemble] - [Monster Crystal]. \n  (2) Place the item you would like to disassemble in the ? slot. \n (3) Click on the 'Make' button and disassemble your equipment item to extract a Monster Crystal from it.
#bTip.#k The higher the quality of the equipment item, the more Monster Crystals you'll be able to extract!
#e6. What is an accelerator?#n
(1) You don't need an accelerator or an upgraded gem to make yourself an item. All you need are the required materials.
(2) If you do not use the accelerator, there is always the chance that the newly made item may end up with either a better or worse set of options.
(3) Use the accelerator and you will definitely end up with an item with better options. If, however, the process is unsuccessful, the materials used for making the item will disappear.

Keep in mind that this method of making items involves a lot of trial-and-error. Combine various types and numbers of materials to see what kind of item you end up with! If you are unsuccessful and you do not get any items in the end, you won't end up losing any of the materials.
#bTip.#k You can always use an accelerator or upgraded gems, but with that comes the possibility that your item will be destroyed.
#bSanta Encyclopedia Volume 1#k
#bCommon Sense of Santa Claus#k

\nNo certain information has been revealed until now about Santa Claus. It is just broadly known that Santa Claus who is making his tour around the world with his sledge and reindeers (including Rudolph) will put in gifts in the socks hung by chimney by the kind children.

As it can be conjectured by a document found somewhere in Germany which looked like a Dairy of Santa Claus, it seems like even Santa Claus does not know when and why he started to giving our presents to children.
However, one thing can be derived from this diary and that is Santa Claus keeps dreaming about repeated dream. Experts carefully predict that this could be a key to secrets of Santa Claus.
Following is a page from his dairy about the dream.
Year XXXX / Date unknown

I had the same dream again today. Like always, it was #b6th of December#k and it looked like somewhere in Turkey. I was hunting in the sky with my flying horse. I hunted with my friends and I think they are some kinds of GOD. I felt as if they are my subordinates because they kept calling me #bOdin#k and me being a GOD leading them.

Tired from hunting for a long time, we decided to take a rest on the roof of a house. It was weird to see that there were #bboots#k hung by the chimney which were coming out from the roof tops. More surprisingly, there were full of Carrot, Grass and sugar inside the boots as if they knew that we will be taking a rest there. We really appreciated their kind effort and spirit so we have filled the boots with candies and gifts and left for the hunting again.

One strange thing is that my followers call me Odin but when I go across the lands and reach Germany, they call me #bSaint Nicolas#k. In Netherlands, they also call me #bSinterKlass#k. It's funny that all of these names sound like my original name, Santa Claus.
BTW, my dream always ends with Director of Sales, Johnson appearing and...(Ellipsis)
#eCygnus Knights' Book Volume 1#n
A recording of the conversation I had with the book containing Cygnus' thoughts.
\n#e#bWho are you?#k#n
My name is Cygnus.  This is the first volume of my books that contain my thoughts.  I am the emperor of Maple World although some call me the young empress.
#e#bWho is the Black Mage?#k

He tried to destroy the entire world long time ago... There are hardly any documents left about him now.  Things written about the Black Mage were so vile and evil that people didn't want to even think about it.

However, if the Black Mage is to be resurrected, that will truly be a nightmare no one wants to think about.  Until now, a small group of elite knights have fought against the Black Mage, but the power of the mage is growing stronger.
#e#bElite knights?#k#n

It's a group of knights I created in order to defeat the Black Mage.  They are called 'Cygnus Knights'.  It's made up of people with different jobs and they fight against the Mage's followers.  Lately, it seems like the knights are getting tired.
So I've been recruiting for more knights.  Black Mage's followers are those who are trying to resurrect him.
#e#bWhere can I meet you?#k#n

Ereve... A drifting island that has been enabled by the spirit's power to float around.  Because of the spirit's power and the power of the Benedict, any monsters or the Black Mage cannot enter.  Once I'm ready to recruit more knights, I am planning to settle down in one spot and start recruiting.
#e#bWhat is a Benedict?#k#n
Benedict is very large... probably about hundreds of times bigger than you.  It's an organism of blessing.  Following tradition, Maple's emperor is chosen by the Benedict.
When the Benedict chooses a person, he or she becomes the emperor of Maple World and the Benedict will always protect them and never abandon them.
\n\n The Benedict is watching out for me from above Ereve right now as we speak.
#eCygnus Knights' Book Volume 2#n
A recording of the conversation I had with the book containing Cygnus' thoughts.
#e#bWho are the Cygnus Knights?#k#n

The Black Mage, who brought chaos to Maple World in the past, is about to be resurrected.  According to our tactician, Nineheart, this state of peace will not last forever.  Before the Black Mage is awoken again, we must grow our strength.
So in order to raise an army that will be able to fight against the Black Mage, I am recruiting for the Cygnus Knights.
#e#bCan anyone become a knight?#k#n
Any maple adventurer can become a knight but there is one condition.  You must at least be level 20 or higher to create a Cygnus Knight character.
#e#bThen does my character transform into a knight?#k#n

No.  The knight character must be created as a new character.  However, I will use my special spirit powers to connect the character who volunteers for knighthood and the newly created knight character.
The two characters connected by the spirit's power can help each other as their own levels advance.
#e#bThe spirit's power?#k#n
The original character will gain a skill called the ‘Spirit's Blessing’.  This skill increases as the knight character's level increases.
#e#bThen can I volunteer for the knighthood right now?#k#n
No, not yet.  We are still in the stage of preparation.  Each of the head knights are working hard to finalize the recruitment process.
#e#bHead Knight Mihile#k#n

My faithful knight, Mihile, was born to be a warrior.  He was given the spirit's blessing in order to fight evil.  Those who first meet him say he's cold and intimidating, but he is my faithful knight with a good heart who is always protecting me.
#e#bHead Knight Oz#k#n
Oz who used to be a Mage from the heavens has been blessed by the spirit of fire.  He is such a friendly and gentle mage.  He gets in trouble by Irena sometimes because he forgets to do his job
#e#bHead Knight Irena#k#n
Irena is an archer who has received the blessing of the spirit of wind.  She often helps out with Oz's work who is a bit clumsy.
\n\nShe is always clam and objective and has a very beautiful heart.
#e#bHead Knight Eckhart#k#n

Eckhart is a thief who has been bestowed with the blessing of the spirit of darkness.  It's hard to see his face because it's always covered with a thief mask.  Because of his sarcastic remarks, sometimes he and Mihile butt heads but his heart is still very sincere.
#e#bHead Knight Hawkeye#k#n
Hawkeye, who has been blessed by the spirit of lightning, is a cheerful pirate.  He is always lightening up the mood of the knighthood.
However, when I give him an assignment, he takes it as seriously as anyone.  He is a great knight.
#eCygnus Knights' Book Volume 3#n
A recording of the conversation I had with the book containing Cygnus' thoughts.
\n#e#bWhat is a Dawn Warrior?#k#n

A Dawn Warrior is swordsman who is one with the spirit of light.  They are led by Mihile who has been bestowed with the blessing of the spirit of light to fight against evil.  Dawn Warriors draw the power of light on their sword.
#e#bWhat is a Blaze Mage?#k#n

A Blaze Mage is a mage that is one with the spirit of fire.  They are led by Oz who has been bestowed with the burning power of the spirit of fire.  These mages can use their magic to increase the spirit's power and freely control it.
#e#bWhat is a Wind Archer?#k#n

A Wind Archer is an archer who is one with the spirit of wind.  They are led by Irena who has been bestowed with the blessing of the ever freely flowing spirit of wind.  Wind Archers can concentrate the spirit's power on their bow to shoot an arrow with great force.
#e#bWhat is a Night Walker?#k#n

A Night Walker is a thief who is one with the spirit of darkness.  They are led by Eckhart, who has been bestowed with the blessing of the spirit of darkness.  They can fight against enemies who cannot be destroyed with the power of light.  Night Walkers can not only use the spirit's power, but they can shoot out a powerful poison as well.
#e#bWhat is a Thunder Breaker?#k#n

A Thunder Breaker is a pirate who is one with the spirit of lightning.  They are led by Hawk Eye, who has been bestowed with the blessing of the spirit of lightning which controls the power of electricity to strike an enemy.
#e#bI think I know all of them now.#k#n

You have read all the books on the Cygnus Knights.  By using the 'Cygnus Knight Quiz' book which will be dropped shortly, you can take the quiz and also receive reward as well.  I wish you good luck.  Until the recruitment for the knighthood begins, may the spirit's blessing be with you...

#eNoblesse Guide#n

Table of Contents
#L1##b1. What is a Noblesse?#k#l
#L3##b2. Basic Controls#k#l
#L9##b3. What is an Item?#k#l
#L11##b4. AP and SP#k#l

#L15##b6. 1st Job Advancement#k#l
1. What is a Noblesse?

While a Noblesse may start out weak, their potential is great. They start with limited skills, but by training in the Forest of Beginning, they'll eventually be powerful enough to join the ranks of the honorable knighthood.
When training in the Forest of Beginning has been completed, Noblesses will move to Ereve to experience the larger world. They will also obtain more skills by
making a Job Advancement. Even the strongest Knights began their careers as Noblesses. Work hard so you can be like them!
#L1##bReturn to the Table of Contents#k#l
2-1. Basic Controls

#eLeft, Right Arrow#n : Move left and right
#eUp, Down Arrow#n : Use rope or ladder to climb up and down, use portal
#eAlt #n: Jump
#eCtrl  #n: Attack
#eZ or 0 in NumPad #n: Pick up items
#eE  #n:  Open Equipment window
#eI  #n: Open Item window
#eS  #n: Open Ability window
#eK  #n: Open Skill window
#bTip.#k At the bottom right corner of the screen, assign one of the Hotkeys with a 'Use' item or a skill for easy access to the item or the skill.
2-2. Commands
Enter the commands below in the chat window to use the corresponding functions.
(1) #eChat#n\n

#e/all#n : Talk in regular chat mode.
#e/buddy#n : Talk in buddy chat mode.
#e/party#n : Talk to party members.
#e/guild#n : Talk to guild members.
#e/whisper [charcater name]#n : Talk to a particular person.
(2) #eAction#n\n
#e/find [character name]#n : Check the login status of the character and the character's current location.\n#e/trade [character name]#n : Request a trade.
(3) #eParty#n\n
#e/partyinfo#n : Display information about current party members.\n#e/makeparty#n : Create a new party.\n#e/leaveparty#n : Leave the current party.
#e/partyinvite#n : Invite a new party member.#b(Party Leader)#k\n#e/partyexpell#n : Kick a party member out of the party.#b(Party Leader)#k
#L1##bReturn to the Table of Contents#k#l
3. What are Items?
(1) #eEquipment Items#n\n  These items can be equipped on characters to boost abilities. You can also equip your purchased cash items, which customize the look of a character.
To equip an item, open the Equipment window and drag the item to the corresponding equipment inventory slot, or simply double-click on the item you want to equip.

(2) #eUse Items#n\n  These items consist of potions that recover HP / MP, scrolls that upgrade equipment, and other consumable items. Double-click on an item to use it. The effects of the item will be applied and then the item will dissappear.
(3)#e Etc. Items#n\n  These include items dropped by monsters, quest items, ores, jewels, and other miscellaneous items.
These items don't do much by themselves but can be used to complete quests and/or interact with NPCs.

(4)#e Cash Items#n\n  Items that can be purchased in the Cash Shop, primarily to customize the look of a character and create other visual effects. #rCash items can be purchased by charging your account with cash. #k
\n#L1##bReturn to the Table of Contents#k#l
4. AP and SP

(1) #eAP(Ability Point)#n\nPoints that can be assigned to one of these categories: Strength(STR), Dexterity(DEX), Intelligence(INT), Luck(LUK), MaxHP, MaxMP.  Earn 6 points each time you level up. #e#bAuto-Assign#k#n Press this to have the game automaticaly assign AP for you.
#bStrength(STR)#k - Essential for equipping heavy weapons or armor. The most important stat for determining the attack strength of Dawn Warriors and Thunder Breakers.
#bDexterity(DEX)#k - The higher this stat, the higher your accuracy and avoidability. The most important stat for determining the attack strength of Wind Archers.

#bIntelligence(INT)#k - The higher this stat, the higher the success ratio of magic attacks. It also increases Max MP and the amount of MP gained at each level up. The most important stat for determining the magic attack strength of Blaze Wizards.

#bLuck(LUK)#k - The higher this stat, the higher your avoidability. It also decreases the amount of EXP lost when a character dies. The most important stat for determining the attack strength of Night Walkers.
(2) #eSP(Skill Point)#n\nPoints that can be assigned to skills after the 1st Job Advancement. 1 point is given with the 1st Job Advancement and 3 points are given each time you level up after that.
5. What is a Job Advancement?
A Job Advancement can be performed once you reach a certain level.  Job Advancements are made as follows: #r1st advancement at Level 10, 2nd advancement at Level 30, 3rd advancement at Level 70#k
Job Advancements allow you to learn new skills and equip new weapons corresponding to your job.
It also increases HP / MP, attack / defense, and the number of inventory slots you have.
6. 1st Job Advancement
In order to make your 1st Job Advancement, you must leave the Forest of Beginning and head to Ereve.
Simply leave the Forest of Beginning to enter Ereve.
Next, move to the NPC that will give you your Job Advancement.
(1)#eDawn Warrior#n\n#rLevel 10 and Above#k Once the criteria is met, meet #bMihile#k in Ereve to learn about the Dawn Warrior.
(2)#eBlaze Wizard#n\n#rLevel 10 and Above#k Once the criteria is met, meet #bOz#k in Ereve to learn about the Blaze Wizard.
(3)#eWind Archer#n\n#rLevel 10 and Above#k Once the criteria is met, meet #bIrena#k in Ereve to learn more about the
Wind Archer.\n
(4)#eNight Walker#n\n#rLevel 10 and Above#k Once the criteria is met, meet #bEckhart#k in Ereve to learn more about the Night Walker.
(5)#eThunder Breaker#n\n#rLevel 10 and Above#k Once the criteria is met, meet  #bHawkeye#k in Ereve to learn more about the Thunder Breaker.

#bTip.#k At the time of your 1st Job Advancement, #byour AP will be redistributed depending on what job you picked.#k After that, it would be smart to put your AP into the stats that enhance your new job.

#bTip.#k If you wait until Lv. 30 to make your Job Advancement, you will not receive the SP corresponding to previous levels. Therefore, we recommend that you make your 1st Job Advancement as soon as you reach the eligible level.

#eLegend's Guide#n

Table of Contents
#L1##b1. What's a Legend?#k#l
#L3##b2. Simple Controls#k#l
#L9##b3. What are Items?#k#l

1. What's a Legend?

The Legend is a historic figure known to have sealed up the Black Wizard in the past. Unfortunately, due to the curse of the Black Wizard, the Legend ended up losing all his skills and memories, and was sealed up inside a block of ice for centuries until one day when Lilin came to his rescue.

After waking up at Rien and experiencing the new world firsthand, you will complete the training both at the Cold Forest and the training center to make the first job advancement. Then, you'll slowly remember the abilities and skills that once made you a Legend.
The resurrection of the Black Wizard cannot be prevented unless you recover all of your previous powers that once made you a Legend. Continue training so that one day you'll be back above the rest!
\n\n#L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l
2-1. Simple Controls

#eLeft/Right Arrows#n : Move left and right
#eUp/Down Arrows#n : Climbing the rope/ladder, use portal
#eAlt#n: Jump
#eCtrl#n: Attack
#eZ or 0 from numpad #n: Pick up item
#eE#n:  Open equipment inventory
#e#n: Open item inventory
#eS#n: Open stat window
#eK#n: Open skill window
#bTip.#k Register your skill or consumable items on the bottom right hand corner of your screen as HotKeys for easy access.
2-2. Commands
Enter the following commands on the chat window to access the following functions.
(1) #eChat#n\n

#e/all#n : Displays chat to everyone.
#e/buddy#n : Only displays chat to your buddies.
#e/party#n : Only displays chat to your party members.
#e/guild#n : Only displays chat to your guild members.
#e/whisper [character name]#n : Sends out a whisper.
(2) #eAct#n\n
#e/find [character name]#n : Displays character's on/offline status along with the user’s current location.\n#e/trade [character name]#n : Sends a request for an item exchange/trade.
(3) #eParty#n\n
#e/partyinfo#n : Displays info on all currently enrolled party members.\n#e/makeparty#n : Creates a new party.\n#e/quitparty#n : Quits from the currently enrolled party.
#e/partyinvite#n : Sends a party invitation.#b(Party Leaders Only)#k\n#e/partyexpel#n : Expels a member from the party.#b(Party Leaders Only)#k
#L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l
3. What are Items?

(1) #eEquipment Item#n\n  An item you can equip on your body. There are two types of equipment items: regular ones that boost your stats, and cash items that are mainly for decorative/accessory purposes.
In order to equip an equipment item, you must open the equipment window and drag the item onto the corresponding slot, or double-click the item.

(2) #e’Use’ Item#n\n  These are consumable items that consist of potions that improve HP/MP, or scrolls that boost the stats of the equipment item. They can be used by simply double-clicking the item. (Since they are disposable items, they’ll disappear after use.)
(3)#e Etc. Item#n\n  These include items dropped by monsters, quest items, ores, gems, and others. Etc. items cannot be used directly,
but can be used to benefit your game through quests and NPCs.

(4)#e Cash Items#n\n These are decorative items, sometimes with special effects, that can be purchased through the Cash Shop. #rCash Items can only be purchased with NX Prepaid, which can be charged to your account.#k
\n#L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l
4. AP and SP

(1) #eAP(Ability Point)#n\nPoints that can be assigned to any of the following categories: Strength (STR), Dexterity (DEX), Intelligence (INT), Luck (LUK), MaxHP, and MaxMP. You’ll receive 5 AP each time you level up. You can press #e#bauto-distribute#k#n to automatically assign the distribution of your AP.
#bStrength (STR)#k ? A necessary stat for equipping heavy armor and weapons. It’s the most important stat that determines the strength of an Aran's attack.
#bDexterity (DEX)#k ? The higher this stat, the higher your Accuracy and Avoidability.

(2) #eSP(Skill Point)#n\nPoints which can be used on skills acquired through job advancements. Starting out as a Legend, no SP will be assigned to you, but make the 1st job advancement and you will receive 1 point. After, each level-up will reward you with 3 Skill Points.
#L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l
5. What's a Job Advancement?

When you reach a certain level, you will be able to make a job advancement. #rThe 1st job advancement takes place upon reaching Level 10, the 2nd at Level 30, the 3rd at Level 70, and the 4th at Level 120#k.
Once you make a job advancement, you will not only receive a group of new skills, but also be able to equip weapons that are specifically made for your job.
Your HP and MP will also receive a uniform boost, as will your attack and defense abilities. You will also be awarded with additional slots in your Inventory.
6. Guide to 1st Job Advancement
To make the 1st job advancement, you must first leave the Ice Cave and head over to Rien.
To get to Rien, escape the Cold Forest and head to the right from the Field West of Rien.
There, you must complete the quests given by Lilin in order to achieve the 1st job advancement.

#bTip.#k Once you achieve the 1st job advancement, #byour AP will be redistributed to fit your job#k. Thereafter, it is recommended that you focus on the stats that pertain to your job class when distributing your AP.

#bTip.#k If you make the first job advancement AFTER reaching Level 30, you will not receive the SP that is available to levels below 30. Thus, it’s highly recommended that you make the job advancement as soon as you are eligible.

#bSanta Encyclopedia Volume 2#k
#bHistory of Santa's Family#k

Just like there aren't not much facts revealed about Santa Claus, so as for the family of Santa. However, according to Director of Sales S.Y Johnson from Maple Herald, one of the Top class media in Maple World, there is a staff who can reach Santa Claus and Santa Claus makes his expresses his official stand once a year through this staff.
S.Y Johnson says he cannot tell the staff's name but emphasized that the staff is quite reliable.

Known from Maple Herald so far, when Santa Claus was making his trip to Finland, he saw a beautiful woman working alone at the Christmas dawn in a Socks factory. She lived in a poor neighborhood and her neighborhood was so poor that children did not even have their own pair of socks to be hung on the Christmas eve.

So, the lady was making the socks for the children all night long. Santa Claus obviously fell in love with her and proposed to her right away which led them to a happy marriage. Santa Claus whose address remains still unknown started to live with Mrs. Santa in #bHappy Ville#k right next to the town where she was from. Mrs. Claus helped her husband by keep making socks in the factory for all the Maplers in Maple World even today.
#bSanta Encyclopedia Volume 3#k
#bMaking Christmas Socks#k

Christmas Socks in Maple World is a must have for the Maplers to get the presents from Santa Claus during the Christmas season. Hang the socks where Santa Claus passes by, and Santa Claus will put in presents in the socks pending on the good deeds you did through our the year.

To have the present from Santa Claus, you will need a standard sized and quality socks. If presents were put in to the wrong sized or disqualified socks, it will be ripped off or the present will be damaged.

This standard has been made by Mrs. Claus who has been running the socks factory in Happy Ville for over 60 years. If the standard is met, the socks can hold any shape and any weight of present. Mrs. Santa finally reveals it secret in the following.

1. Socks Frame : Socks frame is the basic mold to make the right-sized socks. However, artisan who is making this frame has retired so it is no longer produced. It's been told that there are lots of genuine socks frame in Mrs. Claus's socks factory and she is willing to rent it upon requests.

2. Qualified Knitting ball : It is the basic material for the Socks. Only the qualified knitting ball can provide the flexibility and the thermostat which can hold the present from Santa safely.. This qualified knitting ball can be obtained from #bNooNoo the Snowman#k or the monsters around the town.
#bSanta Encyclopedia Volume 4#k
#bSanta Claus, who is he?#k

There is only one who has made an acquaintance with Santa Claus besides the Happy Ville town people. According to S.Y Johnson, the director of sales in Maple Herald, the one is an employee working as a part timer at the Maple Herald.

Through annual reports about Santa Claus in Maple Herald, we can take a glance at a humane aspect of Santa Claus. Santa Claus is fundamentally optimistic. Most of his face is covered with his beard that it is only his eyes we can actually see. However, since he is always smiling, it is only Mrs. Claus who has clearly seen the eyes of Santa Claus.
During off-Christmas season, Santa Claus usually writes back the letters from children all over the world and also takes a good care of reindeers as well as the sledge.

During this season, Santa Claus also estimates the amount and the types of presents that he should be preparing for the next Christmas season according to the letters and makes pre-order to the present company. And then he arranges the stocks from last year and pays the present company.

In fact, this off Christmas season is even busier than Christmas season as preparation is getting harder and harder every year he gets old. Santa Claus is always smiling and happy to eyes of Children as he is bringing dreams and hopes to the world but according to Mrs. Claus, there certainly is suffering and loneliness that Santa Claus should endure. Whenever he is feeling blue, he wouldn't tell his wife but #bhe would go to a big tree in Happy Ville#k and take a rest for few hours.

Recently, more and more children are not starting to believe in Santa Claus anymore and lesser and lesser letter are addressed to Santa Claus every year from Maple World. Mrs. Claus says that this is making him lose his motivation. However, if many Maplers believe in Santa Clause and have confidence that he is coming to town, Santa Claus will find his will again and bring a Happy Christmas in Maple World.
#bSanta Encyclopedia Volume 5#k
#bHow to conduct the good deeds#k

To have the present from Santa Claus, first, you will need to make the standard socks, second, hang the socks where Santa Claus often passes by. Once the socks are hung, do as many good deeds you can to receive a better present from Santa Claus.
Following are the examples of \ngood deeds

- Help your parents
- Study hard
- Not to fight with your friends
- Follow the traffic order
- Not to use vulgar words
- Not to tell a lie
- Not to be greedy and help the others

Not only limited to above, there are so many things that you can do in Maple World. You can conduct good deeds and get the fame in return. The more fame as you have increased, the better present you will get from Santa Claus. You can also have your fame increased by Christmas quests.
#bEncyclopedia Volume 6#k
#bAppendix : Santa Claus town in Finland#k

According to Maple Herald, Santa Claus lives in a town called Rovaniemi in Finland. In here, Santa Claus prepares for the next Christmas and maintains the sledge as well as takes care of reindeers too.

Santa Claus and a lot of people who are helping Santa Claus live in this town. As it gets close to Christmas, millions of letters start to arrive to Santa Claus from all over the world and he writes back every single letters back.
If there are children who want anything from Santa Claus can always write to him to the address below and Santa Claus will write the children back wherever the letter is from.
So, if there are a Maplers out there wishing something from Santa Claus, we recommend you to write a letter to the following address.\n\n#bSanta Claus' Main Post Office, 96930 Napapiiri, Finland#k
#bSanta Encyclopedia Volume 1#k
#bCommon Sense of Santa Claus#k

\nNo certain information has been revealed until now about Santa Claus. It is just broadly known that Santa Claus who is making his tour around the world with his sledge and reindeers (including Rudolph) will put in gifts in the socks hung by chimney by the kind children.

As it can be conjectured by a document found somewhere in Germany which looked like a Dairy of Santa Claus, it seems like even Santa Claus does not know when and why he started to giving our presents to children.
However, one thing can be derived from this diary and that is Santa Claus keeps dreaming about repeated dream. Experts carefully predict that this could be a key to secrets of Santa Claus.
Following is a page from his dairy about the dream.
Year XXXX / Date unknown

I had the same dream again today. Like always, it was #b6th of December#k and it looked like somewhere in Turkey. I was hunting in the sky with my flying horse. I hunted with my friends and I think they are some kinds of GOD. I felt as if they are my subordinates because they kept calling me #bOdin#k and me being a GOD leading them.

Tired from hunting for a long time, we decided to take a rest on the roof of a house. It was weird to see that there were #bboots#k hung by the chimney which were coming out from the roof tops. More surprisingly, there were full of Carrot, Grass and sugar inside the boots as if they knew that we will be taking a rest there. We really appreciated their kind effort and spirit so we have filled the boots with candies and gifts and left for the hunting again.

One strange thing is that my followers call me Odin but when I go across the lands and reach Germany, they call me #bSaint Nicolas#k. In Netherlands, they also call me #bSinterKlass#k. It's funny that all of these names sound like my original name, Santa Claus.
BTW, my dream always ends with Director of Sales, Johnson appearing and...(Ellipsis)
